channel.title: Rune Scimitar emote
channel.description: Whats the emote for rune scim[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 01:01:36 PM[/size][hr]post now plz...i have no time to waste of my life

item.title: Rune Scimitar emote
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1333) // rune scimitar { staticAnimation(559, absX, absY, 100); staticAnimation(559, absX, absY, 100); setAnimation(1331); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; return 2081; }

Hope this helps?

Read full topic
